channel.title: Abhishek Sagar Sanda | AI Engineering Blog
channel.description: Expert insights on AI, LLMs, and cutting-edge technology from an AI Engineer at Northeastern University

item.title: Building Production-Ready RAG Systems in 2026: A Complete Guide
item.description: Learn how to build scalable RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) systems that can handle millions of queries. From vector databases to advanced chunking strategies, I'll show you the architecture patterns that work in production.
item.author: abhisheksagar@northeastern.edu (Abhishek Sagar Sanda)
item.category: RAG, LLM, Vector Database, Production AI, Architecture

item.title: LLM Evaluation Framework: How to Measure AI Model Performance Like a Pro
item.description: Stop guessing if your LLM is performing well. Learn the systematic evaluation framework I developed at Northeastern University to measure accuracy, safety, and business impact of AI models.
item.author: abhisheksagar@northeastern.edu (Abhishek Sagar Sanda)
item.category: LLM Evaluation, AI Metrics, Model Testing, AI Safety

item.title: AI Agent Frameworks in 2026: LangGraph vs CrewAI vs AutoGen
item.description: I've built agents with every major framework. Here's my honest comparison of LangGraph, CrewAI, AutoGen, and othersâ€”with real performance benchmarks and production lessons learned.
item.author: abhisheksagar@northeastern.edu (Abhishek Sagar Sanda)
item.category: AI Agents, LangGraph, CrewAI, AutoGen, Multi-Agent Systems

item.title: Vector Database Performance Optimization: From 10s to 10ms Queries
item.description: I optimized a vector database from 10-second queries to 10-millisecond responses. Here's exactly how I did it, with benchmarks, code examples, and the mistakes that cost me weeks.
item.author: abhisheksagar@northeastern.edu (Abhishek Sagar Sanda)
item.category: Vector Database, Performance, Optimization, Embeddings, Pinecone, Chroma
